caption.p: Virus seed transmission in Arabidopsis. TuMV seed transmission percentage (A) and log number of infected seeds (B) and CMV seed transmission percentage (C) and log number of infected seeds (D) in 18 Arabidopsis accessions are shown. Data for JPN1-TuMV (black), UK1-TuMV (gray), De72-CMV (red), Fny-CMV (blue), and LS-CMV (green) are represented. Note the different scale of each panel.
